mapper.insert: insert into user_address (id, name, mobile, province, city, country, detail, delete_time, user_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_address set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, mobile, province, city, country, detail, delete_time, user_id, update_time from user_address
